titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
ī kōccaṭai paṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ śrīparākrama pāṇṭiya tēvaṟku yāṇṭu 10 vatu kaṉṉi nāyaṟṟu apara pakṣattu pratamaiyum
maiyum peṟṟa uttiraṭṭāti nāḷ teṉkō nāṭṭu nāṭum nakaramum grāmaṅkaḷōm kāraiyūr kiḻavaṉ tēvaṉāṉa kāraiyūr ve kāṇi vilai pramāṇam paṇ
ta paricāvatu iṉṉāṭṭu kūṭalūrāṉa aññūṟṟuva maṅkalattu sapai4yār eṅkaḷukku itu kaṭamai iṟukka āṟṟāteṉṟuñ colla ivvūrai
vēṇṭiṉa iṭattē viṟṟuk koḷḷuṅkō ḷeṉṟu collukaiyil ivvūṟ pakutikku uṭaiyār māḷava cakkaravattikaḷ kāriyattukkuk kaṭavār nīṅkaḷ
meṉṟu maṟikkaiyi latuk koru pōk killāta paṭiyālē ivar iṟaiyilum kāvaluṅ kaḻittu tēva tāṉamākat tiruccūla stāpanam paṇṇi
oḷvī ruḷarō veṉ ṟoru kālāvatu miru kālāvatu muk kālāvatu muṟkūṟa piṟkūṟi i kāraiyūr vēḷār koḷvē ṉeṉkaiyi livaṟku nāṅka
ṟ kicaintu viṟkiṉṟa intak kūṭalūrāṉa aiññūṟṟuvamaṅkalattu sapai4yār kāṇiyāṉa oṉṟu pātiyu mivarkaḷ pakkal muṉṉāḷ inta
vēḷār koṇṭa oṉṟu pātiyu mivarkku ṅkalat tēvatāṉa
inta aiññūṟṟuva maṅkalattukkup peru nāṉ kellai yāvaṉa kīḻpāṟkellai veḷḷāṟṟukkum kiḻakkum ellaikku mēṟkum teṉ
kuḻikkum ellaikku vaṭakkum mēlpāṟkellai kāraikkā vellaikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai veḷḷāṟṟukkut teṟkumāka i
runāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa kuḷamum kuḷap parippum kāluṅ kālkaraiyum vayalum vayaṟ pāccum nattamum nattappāṭum puṉcaikaḷum mēṉōkkiṉa maraṅ
nōkkiṉa kiṇaṟukaḷum maṟṟum eppēṟppaṭṭa samatta prāttikaḷ paḷḷiccantam paḻantēvatānam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam ṉīkki (i)ṟaiyi(li)
ṟuk kuṭuttuk koḷvatāṉa eṇṇi licainta vilaipporuḷ aṉṟāṭu vaḻaṅkuṅ kuḷikai ippaṇam nūṟṟaimpatukkum vilaikkuṟa vi
yāvaṇak kaḷattē kāṭṭi ēṟṟi kaipporuḷaṟak koṇṭu viṟṟu vilai pramāṇam paṇṇik kuṭuttōm ippaṭi viṟṟuk kuṭutta kūṭalūrāṉa aiñ
aṅkala nāṉkellaikkuṭpaṭṭa samasta prāttiyilum paḷḷiccantam paḻantēvatānan tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam muta
tiraṅkaḷu muṭpaṭa inta kāraiyūr vēḷār uṭaiyār tirukkoṭuṅkuṉṟamuṭaiya nāyaṉāṟku vaitta oru tirununtāviḷakku
ku iṟukkum irāci 40 ippaṇam nāṟpatukkum tiruviḷakkup puṟamāka iṟaiyilum puraviluṅ kaḻittuk kuṭuttōm ippaṭi vi
ku pañcupili cantuvikkiṟamam āṭtēvai veṭṭi muṭṭāvāḷ nāṭṭu viṉivōkam kāttikaip poṉ maṟṟum eppēṟpaṭṭa viṉi
m kaḻittuk kuṭuttu kuṭinīṅkā tēvatāṉamāka nāṉkellaiyilum tiruccūlastāpaṉam paṇṇik kuṭuttōm ippaṭikku
ttavar celvatāka uṭaiyār tirukkoṭuṅkuṉṟamuṭaiya nāyaṉār kōyil tirumalaiyilē kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭik
avarākavum ippaṭi cammatittu viṟṟu vilai pramāṇam paṇṇik kuṭuttom kāraiyūr (ki)
aṉāṉa vēḷāṟkku teṉkō nāṭṭu nāṭum nakaramum grāmaṅkaḷom ivai vēḷāṉ tiruka puḷḷaṉ vaṉ eḻuttu ṭaiyāṉ eḻuttu
eḻuttu eḻuttu ivai niṉṟāṉ eḻuttu vai caṅkaṉ aḻakaṉ eḻuttu ivai –e kuca kkuṭi vēḷāṉ eḻuttu ivai i
ivai kurukut tu ivai tirumalai nāṭṭu vēḷāṉ eḻuttu ṅko ṉ eḻu ivai i vattu ku
ttu ceyaṅkoṇṭacōḻa maṇṭalattu civantā ḷaṅko ṭṭaṉ eḻu āṅ tu
eḻuttu cempiya ṉ eḻuttu ivai kiḻāṉnallūr -e tava ṉ e ttā
eḻuttu kaṟka eḻuttu
a yānampi eḻuttu
yaṉ eḻuttu cōlai paṭṭaṉ eḻuttu eḻuttu maṉṉa kka yā rumi ṉ eḻuttu
vālavāyuṭaiyāṉ eḻuttu ttu teṉava ttu -e nārāyaṇa ṉeṉ
akku ya yāṉ cūriya tēvaṉ eḻuttu viḷakku ṉatāṉata uḷ
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Review and updates (based on photos by N. Ramaswamy), encoding, critical apparatus and translation by Emmanuel Francis (2024).
